theorems.name: Theorem equality triangle side side side
theorems.description: If three sides of one triangle are equal to three corresponding sides of the other triangle then these triangles are equal to each other

algorithm: let shifted = triangle1.shifted(by: Shift(i, reversed: reversed))
result.append(BEPolygonEquality(left: triangle1, right: triangle2, leftShift: Shift(i, reversed: reversed)))

theorems.name: Theorem Equality Triangle Side Angle Side
theorems.description: If two sides and the angle between them of one triangle are respectively equal to two sides and the angle between them of another triangle, then such triangles are equal.

algorithm: let shifted = triangle1.shifted(by: Shift(i, reversed: reversed))
if ((EqualitySidesAB && EqualitySidesBC && EqualityAnglesB) || (EqualitySidesAB && EqualitySidesCA && EqualityAnglesA) || (EqualitySidesBC && EqualitySidesCA && EqualityAnglesC) {
result.append(BEPolygonEquality(left: triangle1, right: triangle2, leftShift: Shift(i, reversed: reversed)))

theorems.name: Theorem Equality Triangle Angle Side Angle
theorems.description: If a side and two adjacent angles of one triangle are respectively equal to the side and two adjacent angles of another triangle, then such triangles are equal.

algorithm: let shifted = triangle1.shifted(by: Shift(i, reversed: reversed))
if ((EqualitySidesAB && EqualityAnglesA && EqualityAnglesB) || (EqualitySidesBC && EqualityAnglesB && EqualityAnglesC) || (EqualitySidesCA && EqualityAnglesC && EqualityAnglesA)) {
result.append(BEPolygonEquality(left: triangle1, right: triangle2, leftShift: Shift(i, reversed: reversed)))
